description:
I am proficient in written and verbal English communications. I read research papers, books, write blog posts and code in English too, on a daily basis.

You will find my accent smooth and my words clear when you are talking to me.

I learned a little bit of German, from various sources including Duolingo and a good native German friend of mine.

Bisher kann ich in einem Restaurant nur Essen bestellen, Leute begrüßen und normale Dinge des Alltags sagen.

Yes ... I can talk to machines using a language called binary. Those 0s and 1s start making sense once you get the hang of it.

Don't worry, I'm fluent in Python, JS, C#, and the hottest frameworks you can imagine!

I know a little bit of written and verbal Japanese communications. I can tell you about myself, orderfood, describe my day, and more.

I learned it with my brother who was planning to go to Japan.
